Key: It's morning.
But... am I actually awake?
Yesterday... felt like a dream.
Let me explain. I'll tell you everything I know.
Translation: Deja que te lo explique. Te diré todo lo que sé.

Key:
Yes. Whoever is responsible possesses a great
power. They and they alone.
Translation:
Sí. Quienquiera que sea el responsable
posee un gran poder. Ellos y sólo ellos.

Key:
My body... The "nightmare" you know as me,
has noticed this manipulation.
Translation:
Mi cuerpo... La "pesadilla" que conoces como yo,
ha notado esta manipulación.

Key:
If I am able to absorb whomever holds this
power, then I will attain this power as well.
Translation:
Si soy capaz de absorber a quien ostenta este poder,
entonces yo también lo alcanzaré.

Key:
The other me has been searching for their
location. She appeared to us as a clone,
just as she has appeared to you before.
Translation:
El otro yo ha estado buscando su ubicación.
Se nos apareció como un clon, igual que 
te ha aparecido a ti antes.

Key: And... I am one of them.
Translation: Y... yo soy uno de ellos.

Key: Man, I can't remember all of what Kurumi said.
Translation: Dios, no puedo recordar todo lo que dijo Kurumi.

Key: Was it... real?
No, there is something I remember.
What I remember is...

*giggle*... It's all your fault, Shido-san.
Now I'm a mess.
Translation:
*risitas*... Es toda tu culpa, Shido-san.
Ahora estoy hecha un desastre.

Key:
But... I regret nothing. Because I've come to
realize the importance of spending time with
you.
Translation:
Pero... No me arrepiento de nada.
Porque me he dado cuenta de la
importancia de pasar tiempo contigo.

Key: Thank you, Shido-san.
I'm so glad to have met you...
Translation: Me alegro mucho de haberte conocido...

Key: No, that all happened.
I know I spent the last few days with Kurumi!
Translation: ¡Sé que pasé los últimos días con Kurumi!

Key:
But if her original body disappeared, then
Kurumi... will eventually disappear too.
Translation:
Pero si su cuerpo original desapareció, entonces
Kurumi... acabará desapareciendo también.

Key: What should I do...?
There's no solution, is there?

I just want to see Kurumi. That couldn't have
been our last time together.
Translation:
Sólo quiero ver a Kurumi. Esa no pudo haber
sido nuestra última vez juntos.

Key: (I'm going to see Kurumi. I have to. Or else I—)
Translation: (Voy a ver a Kurumi. Tengo que hacerlo. O si no...)

Key: Kurumi! Hey, Kurumi!
Are you there?! Kurumi, come out!
Is she gone...? Where could she be?

She always comes when I call her. I was sure
she'd show up eventually.
Translation:
Siempre viene cuando la llamo. Estaba
seguro de que acabaría apareciendo.

Key: Kurumi. You're there, aren't you? Come out!
Kurumi! Where'd you go?
She's not here either.
Then, am I supposed to wander for eternity?
Translation: Entonces, ¿se supone que debo vagar por la eternidad?

Key: Kurumi!
Where are you, Kurumi?!
Kurumi, come out!
You out there, Kurumi?!
I searched everywhere...
Wait. Don't tell me she's disappeared already.
Translation: Espera, espera. No me digas que ya ha desaparecido.

Key: Kurumi...
Oh. Shido-san?!
Huh...?
Kurumi, what are you doing here?
I thought it best not to see you anymore.
Translation: Pensé que era mejor no verte más.

Key: Before I knew it, there you were.
Translation: Antes de darme cuenta, ahí estabas.

Key: Since when...?
This morning.

Gotcha. I'm sorry. I guess you were right
in front of me this whole time.
Translation:
Entiendo. Perdóname. Supongo que estuviste
delante de mí todo este tiempo.

Key: Don't tell me... you've been looking for me.
Translation: No me digas... me has estado buscando.

Key: Yeah, but it's fine now. I'm glad you're here.
Translation: Sí, pero ahora está bien. Me alegro de que estés aquí.

Key: Did you come for me?

Yes. I figured the other Spirits would find me,
but all I wanted was to see you.
Translation:
Sí. Supuse que los otros Espíritus me encontrarían,
pero lo único que quería era verte.

Key: Kurumi...
Um...
Oh, Kurumi—!
Wh-What is it?
No, you first.
No, go ahead...
Want to come inside?
Okay.
I brewed some tea.
Thank you... How delightful.

Yeah? Anyone can pour tea. This is nothing
special.
Translation:
¿Sí? Cualquiera puede servir té.
Esto no es nada especial.

Key: That isn't true in the slightest.
Translation: Eso no es cierto en absoluto.

Key: Because you poured it, it is special.
Translation: Porque tú lo has vertido, es especial.

Key: I-I see...
Shido-san.
Hm?
I hadn't planned to see you again.
Translation: No había planeado volver a verte.

Key:
After meeting you, if my fear of disappearing
becomes reality, I don't think I could take it.
Translation:
Después de conocerte, si mi miedo a desaparecer se
hace realidad, no creo que pudiera soportarlo.

Key:
But I couldn't. I wanted nothing more than
to be with you, and before I knew it...
Translation:
Pero no pude. No quería nada más que estar contigo,
y antes de darme cuenta...

Key: I see. I wanted to be with you too.
Translation: Ya veo. Yo también quería estar contigo.

Key: Shido-san, I have a favor to ask of you.
Translation: Shido-san, tengo que pedirte un favor.

Key:
If you're saying good-bye, then don't.
I'll listen to anything else.
Translation:
Si te estás despidiendo, entonces no lo hagas.
Escucharé cualquier otra cosa.

Key:
It may only hurt you, but even so, could you
promise me something?
Translation:
Puede que sólo te haga daño, pero aun así,
¿podrías prometerme algo?

Key: Sure.

I want you to be with me until the moment
I disappear... That is all.
Translation:
Quiero que estés conmigo hasta el momento
en que desaparezca... Eso es todo.

Key: Kurumi...
I know you. You won't accept, will yo—
Of course I will!
Huh?

When I woke up and recounted yesterday,
I immediately got up to look for you.
Translation:
Cuando me desperté y conté lo de ayer,
me levanté inmediatamente a buscarte.

Key:
All day, I ran all over town. You were nowhere
to be found. Unlike usual, no matter how much
I called for you, I couldn't find you.
Translation:
Todo el día, corrí por toda la ciudad. No te encontraba
por ninguna parte. A diferencia de lo habitual, no
importaba cuánto te llamara, no podía encontrarte.

Key:
Honestly, I almost cried. Well, maybe I shed
a tear or two... Haha.
Translation:
Sinceramente, casi lloro. Bueno,
tal vez derramé una lágrima o dos... Jaja.

Key: Shido-san...

If it's going to hurt me anyway, then I want
to be with you as long as I can.
Translation:
Si me va a hacer daño de todos modos, entonces
quiero estar contigo todo el tiempo que pueda.

Key: Shido-san.

Didn't I tell you before? I want to know
everything about you.
Translation:
¿No te lo dije antes?
Quiero saberlo todo sobre ti.

Key:
Goodness, Shido-san. What ever will I do
with you?
Translation:
Dios mío, Shido-san.
¿Qué voy a hacer contigo?

Key: We'll be together forever. Let's be together.
Translation: Estaremos juntos para siempre. Estemos juntos.

Key: Thank you so much.
I...Is it okay for us to be together?
Yeah, of course. I'd like nothing more.
Translation: Sí, por supuesto. No me gustaría nada más.

Key: Then, please prove it to me...
How?
I have one more favor to ask you...
Translation: Tengo que pedirte un favor más...

Key:
Sure. We made it this far, I'll do anything for
you.
Translation:
Claro. Llegamos hasta aquí,
haré lo que sea por ti.

Key: You mean that, right?
I think so...?
Hehehe.

Huh?! Kurumi?! Why did you turn off the
lights?

You're so dull, but I suppose that's part
of your charm.
Translation:
Eres tan aburrido, pero supongo
que eso es parte de tu encanto.

Key: Huh? What do you mean?
What's going on?
Shido-san...
Kurumi? You, um, uh... Er...
Shido-san. Let me feel you.
Let me engrave... the memory... that I was here.
Translation: Déjame grabar... el recuerdo... de que estuve aquí.

Key: Kurumi, I...
Ah...
Shido...san...
Sorry, I'll hang up right away... Oh?
Kotori...?

(Something feels strange. Like a haze or unease
in the back of my mind. Is it a premonition?)
Translation:
(Siento algo extraño. Como una neblina o inquietud
en el fondo de mi mente. ¿Es una premonición?)

Key: Please, I want you to promise me. That you'll\nthink only of Tokisaki-san. That you won't ever\nlet her go. Promise me.
Translation:
Por favor, quiero que me prometas. Que sólo pensarás
en Tokisaki-san. Que nunca la dejarás ir. Prométemelo.

Key:
(All of a sudden, what Rinne said came back to
me. Kurumi and I were connecting here. This is
a moment to savor.)
Translation:
(De repente, lo que dijo Rinne volvió a mí. Kurumi y yo
estábamos conectando aquí. Este es un momento
para saborear).

(Quiero abrazar a Kurumi. Quiero que sepa que este es
su lugar. ¡No quiero dejarla ir nunca!)

Key:
(I could call her back. It might be serious,
but if I answer the phone, I'll miss out on this
precious moment.)
Translation:
(Podría volver a llamarla. Podría ser serio, pero si
contesto al teléfono, me perderé este
precioso momento).

Key: ...Shido-san?
Yes?

(That's right. I already know the answer.
I'm going to...)
Translation: (Así es. Ya sé la respuesta. Voy a...)

Key: Answer.
Don't answer.
